text: wma muhamad 'iilaa rasul min jns alrusul aladhin qablih yablugh risalatan rbh. 'afa'iin maat banqda' ajlh 'aw qutil kama ashaeh al'aeda' rajaetum ean dynkm,, taraktum ma ja'akum bih nbykm? wamin yrjie minkum ean dinih falan yadura allah shyyana, 'iinama yadura nafsih drrana ezymana. ama man thabat ealaa al'iiman washakar rabih ealaa niemat al'islam, fa'iina allah yjzyh 'ahsan aljza'
